downloadTitle: The Austrian Ministry of Interior Automates Business Process
downloadDescription: The Ministry deployed Microsoft Office 2010, Microsoft Visio 2010, and Microsoft SharePoint Server 2010 to take advantage of business process design, workflow, and monitoring capabilities.

downloadFile.name: The Austrian Ministry of Interior Automates Business Process.docx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/9/4/3/943b73fe-c462-4a4f-8d58-b98cfdefe455/The Austrian Ministry of Interior Automates Business Process.docx

detailsSection: The Ministry ordered equipment using a paper-based process that caused delays, and employees had no way to view the status of ordered items.  Nor did field officers have a way to access or update information about cases they were investigating.  To solve the issues, the Ministry deployed Microsoft® Office 2010, Microsoft® Visio® 2010, and Microsoft SharePoint Server® 2010 to take advantage of business process design, workflow, and monitoring capabilities.
detailsSection_file_name: The Austrian Ministry of Interior Automates Business Process.docx
installInstructionSection: Click on the "DOWNLOAD" button (above) to download the case study.
